page.title: 01LIFE AT COTTINGLEY IN 1985
page.content: {Cottingley has about a thousand coun- cil houses,and some private houses. People have moved here mostly from Holbeck,Belle Isle,Middleton (1)to bigger houses (2)redevelopment. There are two tower blocks,a public house, five shops, a new church and commun- ity centre. Most people visit the shops every day and shop in Leeds once a week.The M62 Motorway passes the northern edge of the estate. {Average family size is four and 45% own cars.There is 12% unemployment. Employment includes clerical jobs, manufacturing and public services.A third travel to work by car,but another third are near enough to walk. {People would like to see more shops,a cleaner estate,more activities for under 5's and less vandalism. {There is a wide variety of clubs on the estate which are poorly attended.
